RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 63. Claiming Purse 21900. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 22 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since March 22 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: COWCHI prompted the pace two wide for six furlongs, gained a narrow advantage, drifted out to the six path in deep stretch and proved best under strong handling. LUCKY PENNY ROSE allowed to settle, offered a strong bid three wide on the far turn and finished second best. NOT A WILD BRAT broke outward bumping MOBIL MEISTER at the start, set the pace along the inside for six furlongs, matched strides until deep stretch then was outfinished. CITY SIGNS vied for the lead along the inside, shifted out to the five path entering the stretch then went evenly. BEST OF YOU was through after a half. MOBIL MEISTER was bumped, stumbled and unseated her rider at the start. THE STEWARDS POSTED THE INQUIRY SIGN BUT TOOK NO ACTION.

ENTRY.NAME: Not a Wild Brat
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke outward, bumped rival start, set pace 1/4 pole, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Mobil Meister
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped, stumbled, lost jockey start, walked off

ENTRY.NAME: Cowchi
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, long drive, drifted, edged clear

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 82. Allowance Purse 28000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OPTIONAL OR OHIO BRED. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 22 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since March 2 2 Allowed 4 lbs. Maiden, Claiming, Starter, Optional, or Ohio Bred (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SECRET FIX sprinted to a daylight lead soon after the start, set all the pace unchallenged while getting quick fractions and won as much the best under a strong hand ride. SONNET chased the winner and finished well clear for second in the four path. DATTTSAFANCYFOX unhurried, moved closer along the inside through the far turn then leveled off. ABIGAIL LEE stumbled at the start and was outrun. NO TWOWAYSABOUTIT had brief speed.

ENTRY.NAME: Secret Fix
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted clear, set fast pace, unchallenged, much the best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 3 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 70. Claiming Purse 12200. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE NOVEMBER 22. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SABELLE sprinted to a clear lead soon after the start, set all the pace, dug in gamely when challenged by the runner up and proved best by the narrowest of margins under right handed urging. ROMANTIC JEWEL drifted out soon after the start, start, chased the winner from the inside through the turn, angled out, loomed boldly while drifting out under right handed urging to the middle of the racetrack and just missed. GRAND PRIZE stalked the pace two then four wide into the stretch, angled inside the runner up and finished with good courage in the six path. TUFFIAN never far back, swung wide and closed some ground late in the middle of the racetrack. LUCKY TO HAVE ME was squeezed a few strides out of the gate then failed to reach contention. BISCOTTINI was no threat. ANDIAMA failed to menace. EASY EYES saved ground and weakened in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Romantic Jewel
ENTRY.COMMENT: drifted out start, chased inside, drifted, mid track, just missed

ENTRY.NAME: Sabelle
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted clear, dug in right handed urging, just lasted,

ENTRY.NAME: Tuffian
ENTRY.COMMENT: swung wide, closed gap late mid track

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 4 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 84. Allowance Purse 28000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OPTIONAL OR OHIO BRED. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since April 22 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Mar ch 22 Allowed 4 lbs. Maiden, Claiming, Starter, Optional, or Ohio Bred (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PATIO PARTY sprinted to a narrow lead soon after the start, set the balance of the pace under relentless pressure from the runner up, drifted from the four to the eight paths while under left handed urging through deep stretch and prevailed by the narrowest of margins. HIPPODROME matched strides with the winner two wide into the stretch, was carried out by that one to the nine path and just missed in a game effort. MY BROTHER CAM with the second flight along the inside, angled out entering the stretch, drifted to the middle of the racetrack under left handed urging and was steadily gaining ground late. MOESTER never far back moved up three wide on the backstretch, remained a sharp threat into the stretch then finished evenly. TIP SHEET was no factor. RAMIRIN close up into the stretch, gave way. SCORSESE failed to menace. THE STEWARDS POSTED THE INQUIRY SIGN AND AFTER REVIEW DISQUALIFIED PATIO PARTY FOR INTERFERENCE THROUGH THE STRETCH AND PLACED HIM SECOND.

ENTRY.NAME: My Brother Cam
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside, angled out top lane, drifted mid track, gaining

ENTRY.NAME: Hippodrome
ENTRY.COMMENT: matched strides 2 wide, carried out 9path, just missed,

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Patio Party
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, drifted 4-8paths left urging, all out

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 80. Claiming Purse 16600. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE NOVEMBER 22 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Claiming Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligi bility) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SWEET QUEEN BEE broke in front, set all the pace, drifted out through deep stretch to the six path and maintained her advantage under strong handling. GRAY ROYALITY never far back, surged through the stretch outside rivals and got up for second. BLAZING ZENNA chased the winner from the inside, shifted to the four path entering the stretch then was outfinished. BACKSPLASH chased the pace from between horses two wide and faded in the stretch. GIRLINTHEFIREPLACE stumbled badly at the start and was no factor. CALENDULA stalked the early pace three wide and was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Queen Bee
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, led throughout, held well, drifted 6path

ENTRY.NAME: Blazing Zenna
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, shifted 4path top lane, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Backsplash
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, between horses, 2 wide, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Gray Royality
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, surged outside, up place

ENTRY.NAME: Calendula
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 3 wide, through after half,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 37. Maiden Claiming Purse 17000. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SLICK EDDIE away alertly, made the lead leaving the chute, set all the pace and widened through the stretch under left handed urging to win as much the best CANTRUNWITHBIGDOGS chased the winner from the three path and finished clear for second. JOHNSBUCKEYEBADBOY was bumped at the start and went evenly. MARK'S BUDDY JACIN broke outward bumping JOHNSBUCKEYEBADBOY at the start, chased the pace along the rail and weakened in the stretch. CAN'T CRASHMYPARTY trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Mark's Buddy Jacin
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke outward, bumped start, chased inside, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Slick Eddie
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, full of run, much the best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 81. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 20000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $8,000. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 22 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Sinc e March 22 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000 (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PRINCESS HALIME stalked the pace into the stretch, rallied three wide under left handed urging to make the lead at the furlong marker and drew clear. ANNMARIA delayed the start while refusing to load, chased the pace three then two wide, gained a narrow advantage near the quarter pole then was no match for winner. RADIANTRITHYM away alertly, set the pace along the inside for six furlongs then was outfinished. LOADED ONCE MORE failed to menace. MAGICGIRL trailed early, offered a mild bid three wide on the far turn then came up empty. QUEENOFCATNIPHILL chased the pace along the inside into the far turn then gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Loaded Once More
ENTRY.OWNER: Siesta Thoroughbred Racing Rossi Gregg and Toporcer Greg

ENTRY.NAME: Queenofcatniphill
ENTRY.OWNER: Kahlden Lawrence A and Wiener Brett

ENTRY.NAME: Radiantrithym
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, 1/4 pole, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Annmaria
ENTRY.COMMENT: wouldn't load gate, chased, led, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Princess Halime
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, late rally, 3 wide, drew clear, left urging

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 82. Claiming Purse 27500. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 22 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since March 22 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TOTELLYOUTHETRUTH stalked the early pace, rallied three wide through the turn and upper stretch, made the lead at the furlong marker and prevailed under right handed urging in the four path. GALACTIC away alertly, set a pressured pace along the inside into the stretch then couldn't handle the winner. PLAY BALL with the second flight, finished with good courage in the five path. MISTER MOBIL allowed to settle, swung wide and closed a gap late in the eight path. OHIO EAGLE bobbled at the start and was no threat. DOUGS MORNING PICK was outrun. OHIO MUNNY prompted the pace two wdie into the stretch then folded.

ENTRY.NAME: Mister Mobil
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, swung wide, closed gap 8path

ENTRY.NAME: Galactic
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace mid stretch, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Totellyouthetruth
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, rallied 3 wide turn upper stretch, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Ohio Munny
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, through after half,
